Game.Name: Konjiki no Gashbell!! - Unare! Yuujou no Zakeru (Japan)
Game.plot: Every one thousand years, one hundred mamodo descend upon earth to conduct the ultimate battle. The winner becomes the mighty king of the mamodo world. There is only one problem - in order for the mamodo to use their powerful spell books, they need human partners. Partner up your favorite mamodo and human characters and battle to become the mighty mamodo king.Cheat: CharactersPerform the specified task in order to unlock that team of characters.Cheat: CharactersTo get Ponygon, do the following:Cheat: CharactersPerform the task in order to unlock the specified mode.Cheat: CharactersPerform the operation in order to unlock the item specified after.Cheat: How to get Wonrei&Li-enTo get that couple who look more like two humans that a mamodo and a human, end the game with no loses, and then defeat them
